meanings.definition: A battle or combat between armed forces.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers engaged in intense firefights during the war.
meanings.sent2: The firefights in the movie were very realistic.
meanings.sent3: The video game character always wins the firefights with ease.
meanings.sent4: The firefights between the two factions symbolized the ongoing conflict.
meanings.sent5: The sound of gunfire echoed through the valley during the firefights.

meanings.definition: To engage in a battle or combat with armed forces.
meanings.sent1: The troops will have to firefights against the enemy tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: They firefights bravely to protect their homeland.
meanings.sent3: The kids love to play pretend firefights in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: She firefights against injustice wherever she sees it.
meanings.sent5: The hero always firefights against evil in the stories.
